verses.verse: For, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> cometh, <S%H935><s%> that shall burn <S%H1197><s%> as an oven; <S%H8574><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the proud, <S%H2086><s%> yea, and all <S%H3605><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> wickedly, <S%H7564><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> stubble: <S%H7179><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> that cometh <S%H935><s%> shall burn them up, <S%H3857><s%> <S%H853><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> that <S%H834><s%> it shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them neither <S%H3808><s%> root <S%H8328><s%> nor branch. <S%H6057><s%>

But unto you that fear <S%H3373><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> shall the Sun <S%H8121><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> arise <S%H2224><s%> with healing <S%H4832><s%> in his wings; <S%H3671><s%> and ye shall go forth, <S%H3318><s%> and grow up <S%H6335><s%> as calves <S%H5695><s%> of the stall. <S%H4770><s%>

And ye shall tread down <S%H6072><s%> the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they shall be <S%H1961><s%> ashes <S%H665><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> this, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> ye the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded unto <S%H6680><s%> him in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments. <S%H4941><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> you <S%H853><s%> Elijah <S%H452><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the coming <S%H935><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> and dreadful <S%H3372><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall turn <S%H7725><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the children, <S%H1121><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> their fathers, <S%H1><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with a curse. <S%H2764><s%>
